text:
Swift to perform at F1 Grand Prix

Pop star Taylor Swift is set to perform at the U.S. Formula One Grand Prix. She has been drafted in to perform at the event in Austin, Texas, on October 22. Circuit of the Americas chairman Bobby Epstein said, “ We think we will sell every ticket that we have got and it is because of the combination of both Formula 1 and Taylor Swift.” — PTI
title: ENT-SWIFT
